scripts.merge-to-master: git checkout master && git merge develop
scripts.merge-to-develop: git checkout develop && git merge master
scripts.postshrinkwrap: git add npm-shrinkwrap.json && git commit -am 'preversion: recreate shrinkwrap'
scripts.shrinkwrapcleanup: git rm npm-shrinkwrap.json && git commit -am 'postversion: remove shrinkwrap for develop'
scripts.preversion: npm run merge-to-master && npm run preshrinkwrap && npm shrinkwrap && npm run postshrinkwrap
scripts.postversion: npm run merge-to-develop && npm run shrinkwrapcleanup && npm run push
